name: Yunkui Tales
desc4: When using <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, CRIT Rate increases by 4%, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When having 3 stacks of this effect, Sheer DMG increases by 10%.
story: Records of songs and rhymes passed down through generations at Yunkui Summit - tales of clouds, stories of mountains, and chronicles of those who dwelled among the peaks and drifted through the mists.
